name: Magic Mountain
storyline: An out-of-reach rope above a rock fissure is the only way into this Magic Mountain - or is it? Rumour has it that there are vast stores of treasure inside, but legends also tell of huge poisonous spiders, lizards and magic at work - you'll need more than just cunning to come out of this in one piece!
summary: A ZX Spectrum text adventure where you must enter the titular Magic Mountain and recover the ancient Scroll of wisdom. But beware of poisonous spiders, monsters and magical traps!
